muslim waru wadiwenne eka minihekuta ganu hathara denek ganna puluwan nisa noweyi.hathara denek bandapu muslimkarayo nathi tharam.un niyama wayasen kasada badina nisath api wage dadi upath palanayak nokarana nisath.muslim kanthawan batahira ganu wage 50%ta nulata thithata pangu peruwata pirimith ekka kulal kaganne nathi nisa loke hama ratakama muslim aya wadi wenawa.amarikawe mita dashaka gananakata pera ganu bra ginithabamin samiyanta daruwanta shapa kirima prawruththiyak wuna.eeta dashaka deka thunakata passe prawruththiyak wune‚Äù amarikawe sudu jathiya sulu jathiya wana lakunu ‚Äùyannayi.batahira sanskruthiya thiyana hama ratakama aarthikaya kada watenneth janagahanaya runa wenneth sthiwadaya nisayi.shiromi gunasekarala suhangi herathla,niranji karunanayakala kiyanne batahira jesi barnadla,jeni murela,katharin makinonla kiyana dewal thamayi.sanganana wartha pramadaya ganath eka eka dewal kiyanawa neda?
bas rathayak ho wahanayak nopaminima nisa itha wishala durak payinma giye athara manga hamuwuna kuda kandu tharanaya karamin ala dola ganngada tharanaya karamini.
midum sela ada dawase soya ganimata nohaki wuye chanda hiru ras wahi diya boho kalayakin nolada dumbara wanapethata boho seyin danena heyini.

kodithuwakkudikwalla wawuru kannala buduraja maha wehera siyak riyan usa buddhaprathimawahansege ranwan paha mosayid aalepa kirimata piyawara gena thibe. 1966 warshaye agnidiga aasiyawe wishalathama buddha prathimawahanse lesa arambau siyak riyan buddha prathimawahansege warnalepaya sandaha yoda ganu labu mosayid bolwi galawi durwarnawemin pawathina heyin ranwan pahathi aanayanika mosayid aalepa kota darshaniyathwayata path kirimata kriyakaragena yana bawa wawuru kannala buduraja maha wehera adhipathi aacharya dikwalle thissa nahimiyo pawasathi.kalani tharuna bauddha samithiyakalani tharuna bauddha samithiya meheyawimen wesak poda dawasa pura pinkam rasak sidu kare.

madaperadiga rosa wasanthaya wani wadapiliwelak shri lankawe kriyathmaka kara me rajaya perala damiya yuthu yayi hitapu hamudapathi sarath fonseka mahatha prakasha kara thibena bawath ewani wadapiliwelak niyamitha kalayata mathiwarana pawathwana shri lankawa wani aasiyathika ratakata nogalapena bawath chandayakin rajaya parajaya kara nohaki bawa penena nisa sarath fon seka mahatha mewani prakasha sidu karana bawath idikirim, injineru sewa, niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathi wimal wirawansha mahatha pawasiya.amathiwaraya me adahas pala kale mahajana bankuwa samanga kriyathmaka karana janasewana upahara jathika niwasa wadasatahana yatathe kolambaa disthrikkaye rajya sewakayin 350k sandaha rupiyal miliyana 150ka niwasa mulyadhara pradanaya kirime uthsawaye pradhana aaradhithaya washayen maharagama pradeshiya lekam karyaliya shrawanagaraye pawathi uthsawayata sahabhagi wemini.ehidi wimal wirawansha mahatha meseda kiya.chanda nathi ratawala thamayi rosa wasanthaya thibune.
